title: #305: Behind the Scenes of America’s Most Wanted with Elizabeth Vargas
description:
Jim, Laura and Lisa sit down with the Emmy award-winning journalist Elizabeth Vargas to talk about her new role on Fox’s reboot of America's Most Wanted (which Jim Executive Produces). Jim and Elizabeth fill us in on how the show works behind the scenes, and incredibly, how offenders are already being brought to justice.

https://www.fox.com/americas-most-wanted/


This week’s episode is brought to you from our sponsors who have some great offers just for you:

ANA LUISA JEWELRY

Treat yourself and a loved one to beautifully crafted pieces of exceptional quality at fair prices with no luxury mark up. Go to www.analuisa.com/realcrime

and use our code REALCRIME to get -10.0% off. We absolutely recommend them – they’re a great brand making beautiful, sustainable jewelry!

Go check out www.analuisa.com/realcrime

code REALCRIME 


NOOM - There's a science to getting healthier. It's called Noom. Based in psychology, Noom teaches you how to eat, so you can accomplish your personal health goals and stick with them long-term. Because you don’t need rules to lose weight, you need knowledge.

Learn how to eat again with Noom. Sign up for your trial today at  www.noom.com/REALCRIME


THIRDLOVE - It’s time to break up with your bad bra and fall in love with better bras and underwear. Your boobs deserve it! ThirdLove is changing the game when it comes to comfort and style for all of your everyday essentials. From loungewear and wireless styles, to their #1 rated 24/7™ Classic T-Shirt bra, they’re creating the ultimate shopping experience. Every ThirdLove bra is made with signature memory foam cups, no-slip straps, and a scratch-free band — from cups AA–I, including half-cups, and bands 30–48. 

Go to www.THIRDLOVE.com/REALCRIME

 now to find your perfect-fitting bra… and get 20% off your first purchase! 

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

AMERICA’S MOST WANTED! Don’t miss Jim’s new hit show America’s Most Wanted, which is ALREADY bringing offenders to justice. Hosted by Elizabeth Vargas, you can watch AMW on Fox Mondays 9/8 central https://www.fox.com/americas-most-wanted/


It’s OSCAR Season at KILLER CASTING and Lisa is in a bit of a tizzy on how to cover this highly flawed award ceremony …but she is going to try! Check out her PRE Oscar episode, and then stay tuned for coverage on Francis McDormand in Nomadland and Viola Davis in Ma Rainey’s Black Bottom. https://killercasting.libsyn.com/017-pre-oscar-discussion?fbclid=IwAR3YbhP7gzesIe1FxlHYbT9jv976KOTN6WY1mednUqC0RrCt0lsKmm2zr3Y
